title: China’s tech giants are having FOMO on NFTs - TechCrunch
content: China’s tech giants are having FOMO on NFTs  TechCrunch
description: In mid-April, a group of industry associations in China issued a warning against the potential financial risks of non-fungible tokens, digital assets that represent real-world objects or intangible goods like a song. NFTs must not be traded with cryptocurrencies, said the country’s banking, i…
